locations.name: Soufrière
locations.description: The first part of the tour is based in a hillside retreat near the iconic Pitons, strongly suggesting the Soufrière area, known for its dramatic volcanic scenery and luxury boutique resorts offering such views.

locations.name: Rodney Bay
locations.description: The second part involves moving to a larger, all-inclusive beachfront resort. Rodney Bay is the most prominent area in St. Lucia matching this description, known for its extensive bay, beaches, marina, and concentration of larger resorts and amenities.
